page.title: 06A WEEKEND IN MY LIFE
page.content: { Saturday:}I go{riding}so I have to be up early.It only takes me ten minutes to dress in my jodphurs and shirt and I quickly eat half a bowl of cereal before going to the top of the drive to be picked up by my friend.I usually ride Happy or Snowy who are both greys and my ride lasts for two hours.We take my friend home after riding and I get changed as soon as I get home.I often then{ride my bike around our yard,as I live on a farm,usually with my friend Annabelle. We have a quick lunch of sandwiches at 1.00 and then I watch television or do any{homework}until it is dinner time which I hate because we all have to sit round the dinner table and Dad always takes a long time.When we have eaten I watch television until 9.30 when I go to bed.
